https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mX83VFjDknGQsV5Amfi2zKF3Tbm.jpg In Germany's Hurtgen Forest, during the final days of World War 2, an exhausted and overwhelmed band of American army paratroopers fight for survival amid a deadly hidden threat, escalating internal conflict and seemingly impossible odds. 1945 From This Day
